[b][color=white]Discord Authorization and Integration[/color][/b]
A new exciting feature has been introduced. Now users can link their Discord account with their HF account. It's a significant feature to reduce the scam rate. Kindly visit the dedicated thread to know the steps on how to integrate your account. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6088813]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Unique Passwords for HF[/color][/b]
Just a heads up. All users are requested to use unique passwords for their HF profile and use 2FA to prevent account hack. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6089695]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6089695][color=#FFFFFF]Unique Passwords for HF[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
Omniscient had made a thread talking about how important it is to not use the same password for each site you use. This means if you have the same password on one account. If it gets hacked then that password can be used for all your other accounts, even your Hack Forums account. So please make sure you have F@A on and use different passwords.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6088813][color=#FFFFFF]Discord Authorization and Integration[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
You can now get back into the Hack Forums discord. In recent news, we mention the HF API V2 with the new API Xerotic had added a feature where you can use hack forums and discord together to confirm you are who you say you are on discord. This was put in place to help stop people from scamming people with the same name on discord.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6089738][color=#FFFFFF]World's largest dam might be unstable because of severe rainfall.[/color][/url] - [mention=4706348]
The world's largest dam known as the Three Gorges Dam in China has got some expert attention warning everyone it could collapse due to very poor weather over the last few months. The nonstop downpours have also raised the Chinese public's concerns over the potential bursting of the world's biggest hydropower project. Despite the Chinese government says the dam is structurally sound.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6089243][color=#FFFFFF]HF 10 Year Anniversary Thread[/color][/url] - [mention=402384]
A member of the forum is celebrating their 10th year being on the site. They have shared who they have been affected by and who changed them. They have shared a really nice story about their time here and how ten years at Hack Forums have changed their life. Riggs has even made a little thank you list of those who really helped him along his way.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6089610][color=#FFFFFF]What will you do when covid ends?[/color][/url] - [mention=2791600]
Once we all can get out of lockdown and can go anywhere we like without being restricted. Wespa has made a thread talking about what everyone will be doing and what their plans are when the whole issue ends. Wespa has stated they are going to go on a trip somewhere with his mates.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6088514][color=#FFFFFF]$200 BTC Contest || Post to Enter || 5 Winners[/color][/url] - [mention=4754040]
A member currently known as Leon Robb is giving away $200 in bitcoin. Five members a chance at winning a share of the prize. The giveaway lasts just over two weeks, and you have up to five chances at winning one of the prizes, so make sure you enter before it's too late.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Boruto Anime Airs New Episode on July 5 After COVID-19 Delay[/color][/b]
Though there are not too many of you, those who are fans of the Boruto series will be pleased to hear that the anime will be continuing the series on July 5 after being on delay since May 3. The introduction of the "Kara Begins Arc" will begin on July 19, which will be the 157 episode of the show. "The magazine also announced new cast members, including Tetsuya Kakihara as Deepa, and Chō as Victor. Kenjiro Tsuda was previously announced as the voice for Jigen." ([url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-06-26/boruto-anime-airs-new-episode-on-july-5-after-covid-19-delay/.161114]source[/url]) [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-06-26/boruto-anime-airs-new-episode-on-july-5-after-covid-19-delay/.161114]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Netflix Adds 1st Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters Anime Season on July 8[/color][/b]
If you grew up in the early or late '90s and watched Cartoon Network, then you most likely watched Yu-Gi-Oh growing up. Those who have been aching to re-watch the series or those who did not complete it, due to the fact that CN (Cartoon Network) would always air the shows out of order, then you are in for a treat as Netflix will be releasing the first season of Yu-Gi-Oh Duel Monsters! There is no confirmation on whether or not more seasons will be released. There are over 200 episodes of the series, which is why one season just will not cut it! Right?! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-06-25/netflix-adds-1st-yu-gi-oh-duel-monsters-anime-season-on-july-8/.161098]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cyberpunk 2077 Will Be Getting an Anime Adaption[/color][/b]
The Cyberpunk 2077 game, which is scheduled to release sometime at the end of this year, will be getting an anime adaption named, "Edgerunners." The game developers over at "CD Projekt Red" will be working with the popular anime studio "Studio Trigger" on the anime project. The good news is that the anime will air on Netflix, however, it will not air until the year 2022! A [url=https://youtu.be/E7dKVCw7bkE]video[/url] published on the official YouTube channel of the Cyberpunk 2077 game goes into detail on the inspiration of the game. Additionally, you meet the people working on the game and more of their backstory growing up with the "cyberpunk scene" in Japan. [i][size=x-small][url=https://kotaku.com/cyberpunk-is-getting-an-anime-adaptation-subtitled-edg-1844165765]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Violet Evergarden Movie Confirms September Release Date![/color][/b]
Due to the COVID-19 epidemic, the Violet Evergarden movie was delayed twice this year. Thankfully, a new release date was given for this September. Of course, this is for Japan only currently. Western countries will most likely be able to see the movie with English subtitles a year or two later. With the announcement, a one minute [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PUFFMnuOF40]video[/url] trailer about the movie. In the title, you will note "2020年9月18日." In Japan, they use "Year:Month:Day" format, therefore, the official release date is this September 18! For those who have not seen the original anime, it is a must. This movie will be a continuation of the story in the main series. The anime was released back in 2018, so if you've forgotten bits and pieces you may want to rewatch the series! Furthermore, the anime was scheduled to air this Jan. 10 but because of a fire at the Kyoto Animation studio, there was a delay. Additionally, Japan went into quarantine and as a result, the second delay occurred. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5ef46136bd60a6bf2cbf97a2/Violet-Evergarden-Movie-Confirms-September-Release-Date!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/technews-invisible.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Apple to Bring Their Own Chips to Macs[/color][/b]
Some experts say Apple is moving to its chips by 2021. Apple is still using its chips in iPhones and iPads, and adding them to Macs will be a wise step. It will be a significant help to the business and customers who have stuck with Apple or are just entering their ecosystem. Better battery life and slimmer devices will be one of the critical advantages of this change. “Moving to ARM-based chips can bring efficiencies and better battery life without sacrificing performance. It may also help to cut out some size issues, possibly allowing Macs to be made thinner, while also negating the need for fans,” said David McQueen, research director at ABI Research. This would also give Apple another competitive advantage to more easily control its product launch.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/06/21/tech/apple-mac-chips-wwdc/index.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]A New King of Supercomputers[/color][/b]
A new supercomputer has taken the title for the fastest supercomputer in the world, previously owned by IBM's supercomputer. Fugaku runs at 415,53 petaflops (a petaflop is 1,000 teraflops, resulting in one quadrillion floating-point operations per second), which is 2.8 times faster than the previous supercomputer. In the battle against COVID-19, Fugaku was put to work by demonstrating how droplets from people disperse in tight locations. Over the last six years, this supercomputer has been built and currently resides in Kobe City.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-53147684] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]AirPods Life to Last Longer[/color][/b]
A new feature to ship with iOS 14 is that AirPods will have extended lifetime. iOS 14 will learn how to age your AirPod battery and avoid charging once 80% is hit and continue to 100% later. This feature already exists in many of their products to help prevent the battery from aging, as lithium-ion batteries mature over time. It is a significant advantage because AirPods do not have the option to remove the battery inside them; instead of a modular design, they are glued together.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2020/6/23/21300942/apple-airpods-battery-life-cycles-ios-14-optimized-charging] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
